structure.unit: COUNTY AND CITY BRIDGES, TUNNELS, AND FERRIES

law.catch_line: Interest on bonds -- Maturity -- Redemption before maturity.

text.section: The bonds shall bear interest at a rate or rates or method of determining rates, payable at least annually, and shall mature not more than thirty (30) years from the date of their issuance, at a date fixed by the commission.
The bonds may be made redeemable before maturity, at the option of the commission, under terms fixed by the commission prior to the issuance of the bonds.

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 274, sec. 41, effective July 15, 1996. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3235g-17.
